citation.article-title: Pontibacter xinjiangensis sp. nov., in the phylum ‘Bacteroidetes’, and reclassification of [Effluviibacter] roseus as Pontibacter roseus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Pontibacter xinjiangensis sp. nov.
Pontibacter xinjiangensis (xin.jiang.en′sis. N.L. masc. adj. xinjiangensis pertaining to Xinjiang, an autonomous region in north-west China).
Cells are Gram-negative, aerobic, rod-shaped and non-motile (0.4–0.6×1.2–2.0 μm).
Colonies on 0.3× MA are circular, convex, shiny, pink and smooth.
Hydrolyses gelatin, aesculin, starch and casein, but not tyrosine, chitin or cellulose.
Nitrate reduction, H2S production, citrate utilization, indole production, glucose acidification, arginine dihydrolase and urease are negative.

According to API ZYM, the type strain is positive for alkaline phosphatase, esterase (C4), esterase lipase (C8), leucine arylamidase, valine arylamidase, cystine arylamidase, trypsin, α-chymotrypsin, acid phosphatase, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase and N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, but negative for lipase (C14), β-glucuronidase, α-glucosidase, β-glucosidase, α-mannosidase and α-fucosidase.

In Biolog GN2 microplates, the type strain is positive for dextrin, glycogen, cellobiose, d-fructose, d-galactose, α-d-glucose, α-d-lactose, maltose, d-mannitol, d-mannose, raffinose, sucrose, methyl β-d-glucoside, l-rhamnose, trehalose, l-leucine, d-gluconic acid, l-glutamic acid, α-d-glucose 1-phosphate and d-glucose 6-phosphate.

Does not utilize α-cyclodextrin, Tween 40, Tween 80, N-acetyl-d-galactosamine, d-arabinose, i-erythritol, l-fucose, melibiose, d-psicose, d-sorbitol, xylitol, pyruvic acid methyl ester, acetic acid, cis-aconitic acid, citric acid, formic acid, d-galactonic acid lactone, d-glucuronic acid, α-, γ-hydroxybutyric acid, p-hydroxyphenylacetic acid, itaconic acid, α-ketobutyric acid, α-ketoglutaric acid, malonic acid, propionic acid, quinic acid, sebacic acid, succinamic acid, d-alanine, l-histidine, l-pyroglutamic acid, d-serine, γ-aminobutyric acid, urocanic acid or 2-aminoethanol.

The major fatty acids of the type strain are iso-C15 : 0, iso-C17 : 0 3-OH, summed feature 3 (containing C16 : 1ω7c and/or C16 : 1ω6c) and summed feature 4 (comprising anteiso-C17 : 1 B and/or iso-C17 : 1 I).
The G+C content of the genomic DNA of the type strain is 47.8 mol%.
The type strain, 311-10T (=CCTCC AB 207200T=NRRL B-51335T), was isolated from a soil sample from Xinjiang, China.
